statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, height, weight FROM PatientData ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT id, first_name, gender, medical_history FROM PatientData WHERE blood_type = 'A+';
SELECT id, last_name, date_of_birth, treatment_history FROM PatientData WHERE height > 170;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, weight FROM PatientData WHERE weight > 70 AND height < 170
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, medical_history FROM PatientData WHERE blood_type = 'O-' LIMIT 3
SELECT id, last_name, treatment_history FROM PatientData WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31'
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, gender, height, weight FROM PatientData WHERE medical_history LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients ORDER BY address;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='Fever';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' AND address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='Hypertension' AND treatment='Medication';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, gender FROM patients GROUP BY gender HAVING total_patients > 10;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT name, age FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT address FROM patient_demographics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment, treatment_date FROM treatment_data ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, age FROM patient_demographics JOIN medical_history ON patient_demographics.id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_age FROM patient_demographics
SELECT name, medical_condition, diagnosis_date FROM patient_demographics JOIN medical_history ON patient_demographics.id = medical_history.patient_id AND diagnosis_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(treatment) AS treatment_count FROM treatment_data GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis, date_of_diagnosis FROM medical_history ORDER BY date_of_diagnosis DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_data WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialization FROM physicians WHERE specialization IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis='Cancer';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT first_name, last_name, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM patient_demographics JOIN medical_history ON patient_demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE date_of_diagnosis > '2020-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_date FROM medical_history WHERE treatment_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM physicians WHERE specialization='Cardiology' AND first_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics
SELECT name, age FROM PatientDemographics ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_id ASC
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT name, age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis, doctor FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY date_diagnosed DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_description FROM TreatmentData WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications JOIN PatientDemographics ON Medications.patient_id = PatientDemographics.patient_id WHERE age > 30;
